description: Tony`s Mother was talking to Officer Jenny when Ash and his friends arrived on the scene. Tony`s Mother was upset because her son Tony was missing. Officer Jenny said there had been reports that a Pok√©mon uncommon in the area was walking with a boy looking like Tony on its back. Tony`s Mother explained that he might have gone to the observatory as her husband works there and it`s his birthday. She continued by saying Tony was excited to celebrate it with him and even prepared a present but her husband had to stay overnight at the observatory and couldn`t come home. Officer Jenny instructed Tony`s Mother to stay at home incase he returned there.
name: Tony no Okaasan
